summary: An ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 16378 entitled: "An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Seattle Boulevard from Judkins Street to 9th Avenue South; 9th Avenue South, from Seattle Boulevard on the north to Seattle Boulevard on the south; Seattle Boulevard from 9th Avenue South to 8th Avenue South; and 8th Avenue South from Seattle Boulevard to Court Street, all in the City of Seattle, by construction of an asphalt roadway thereon, all in accordance with Resolution No. 667 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improving district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Immediate Payment" under the provisions of Ordinance No. 5693 of said city, approved December 6, 1899", approved July 1, 1907.
